ems_linking.title: Link EMS Account
ems_linking.description:
To receive personalized tariff data, you need to link this Home Assistant instance with your EKZ account.

**Please follow these steps:**

1. Open this URL in a new tab: [{truncated_url}]({linking_url})
2. Approve the linking on the EKZ portal
3. After completing the linking, **return here manually** and click 'Submit' to continue

Note: The EKZ page may redirect you away, but you need to come back to this page to finish the setup.

application_credentials.description:
To set up OAuth credentials for EKZ:

1. Contact EKZ to request OAuth credentials for the myEKZ API
2. Fill out their OAuth application form
3. Once approved, you'll receive a Client ID and Client Secret
4. Enter those credentials here

For more information, visit: [EKZ OAuth Setup]({oauth_info_url})
